result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Micah D. Quiroz

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 8, 2022 at 02:50 pm.

Clerk: Amy. 
Called:  9:23 a.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF432, 22CF1119, 22CF1154, 22CM275.
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. 
Defendant appears in custody from MCJ with Atty Wright Laufenberg.  

Date and time set for FPT; VRCW. 
Atty Laufenberg makes statement; was headed toward resolution at last hearing but deft has picked up new charges.  Deft on PO hold.  Atty Laufenberg states they are willing to waive time limits for prelims on newer cases (22CF1119 and 22CF1154); requesting another pretrial date. 
ADA Mayo has no objection to waiving time limits. 
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits. 

COURT sets PTC for 11/08/22 at 2:50 p.m. 

Adj:  9:26 a.m.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:15 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CF1119 & 22CF1154.

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes Atty Wright Laufenberg has been appointed.
COURT finds good cause to extend time limits for preliminary hearing. 
Prelim set for 10/24/2022 @ 10:10 am, Courtroom B.

Adj: 1:17 pm.
Final pre-trial on October 18, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Clerk: Amy. 
Called:  9:16 a.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF432, 22CM275.
State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen. 
Defendant appears in person with Atty Wright Laufenberg. 

Date and time set for JSH.  
Atty Laufenberg states negotiations are ongoing; confident resolution will be received, requesting FPT/TP date. 
State has no objection. 

COURT sets SC/TP for 10/18/22 at 9:15 a.m. 

Adj:  9:20 a.m.
Probable Cause Found
of Preliminary Examination

Clerk: Amy. 
Called:  1:36 p.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF432, 22CM275. 
State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen. 
Defendant appears in person with Atty Wright Laufenberg. 

Date and time set for preliminary hearing in 22CF432; VRCW. 
Waiver of Prelim. filed; COURT questions deft as to waiver.
COURT finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. 
Information will be e-filed; Reading Waived; R/J. 
Plea >> NOT GUILTY.  

COURT removes FPT 7/07/22 at 9:40 a.m. and JT 8/30/22.

COURT continues JSH/TP for 8/09/22 at 9:10 a.m. 

Adj:  1:40 p.m.
Waiver of Prelim on June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

No contact with victim(s): A.J.C.; Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  No driving without valid DL. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Case Called: 2:09 pm
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person for ADA Lacey Coonen. Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Adam Fontana in person.

VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.

BOND: 
$5,000 Signature Bond.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): A.J.C.
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
